name: Candy World Adventure: The Fate of Lillians
name_original: Candy World Adventure: The Fate of Lillians
description:
Candy World Adventure: The Fate of Lillians is an arcade game developed by Xilvan Design. It was originally released in 2009. Xilvan Design published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Candy World Adventure: The Fate of Lillians on PC.
